Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール・宿屋・客室
<speed:00>『旅人のための伝言ノート』 キュリアが勝手に診察メモに使った。 中身はとっ散らかっているが、 キュリアの字はとても美しい。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>"Notebook" It's a notebook that Dr. Curia used for the medical examination. Her notes are all over the place, but her handwriting is exquisite.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>のところへ 行かなくていいのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't you going to go to where <Tytree> is?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたは……ミーシャに 近づかないでちょうだい……
Entry.EnglishText: Can you please... stay away from Misha...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャの事なら、 心配いらないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's no need for you to worry about Misha.

Entry.JapaneseText: 相変わらずの ガジュマ嫌いみたいね……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like you still hate Gajumas, huh...?

Entry.JapaneseText: もう一度、お父さんが日ごろ、 どんな事を言っていたか、 思い出してみたら？
Entry.EnglishText: Try and remember what your father usually said to you every day.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこも具合、悪くない？ もし、身体の異状を感じたら、 すぐにうちへいらっしゃい。
Entry.EnglishText: Are you alright, does it hurt somewhere? Feel free to come by my place whenever you feel something off.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近はどう？ 医者になるには 勉強、勉強、よ。
Entry.EnglishText: How's it been lately? You'll have to study harder and harder if you want to become a doctor.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一人前の医者になれるよう、 応援してるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'll be rooting for your growth into becoming a full-fledged doctor.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私が言うのもなんだけど…… <Annie>の事、お願いします……
Entry.EnglishText: It's not my place to say this, but please watch over <Annie>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣の力は もう全部集まったの？
Entry.EnglishText: Have you finally managed to gather all of the Divine Beasts' power?

Entry.JapaneseText: すべてはあなたたちの肩に かかってるんだから…… がんばって……！
Entry.EnglishText: Everything rests upon your shoulders, so don't give up!

Entry.JapaneseText: 浄化はもう終わったのよね？
Entry.EnglishText: The purification's supposed to be finished, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、街の中は以前にも 増してゴタゴタしてる。 どうなってるの……？
Entry.EnglishText: But it looks like the city's in more disarray than before. What on earth is happening?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなた…… 少し落ち着きなさい。 何をそんなに焦ってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey... Slow down! What are you in a hurry for?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたち…… <Veigue>の事、 少し気にかけてあげて……
Entry.EnglishText: Care a little more about <Veigue>, won't you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、くれぐれも 無理はしないで……いいわね。
軍が来て、 騒ぎは落ち着いたけど、 結局何も解決してない……
Entry.EnglishText: The army came and calmed the uproar, but nothing's been resolved yet...

Entry.JapaneseText: 全部、私たちの心の持ちようが 原因なんだとしたら…… 私に何ができるって言うの？
Entry.EnglishText: If everyone's feelings are the root of this problem... Then can you tell me how to help?

Entry.JapaneseText: 医者にできるのは病気や ケガの手当てをする事だけ……
Entry.EnglishText: The only thing I can do as a doctor is treat physical illnesses and wounds...

Entry.JapaneseText: 心のキズを乗り越えるには 最後は自分の力しかないの……
Entry.EnglishText: When it comes to a wounded heart, you only have your own self to rely on...

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしは悪くない…… わたしは……何も……
Entry.EnglishText: I... It's not my fault... It's not my... I didn't do...

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼ、ぼくは 大丈夫ですから……
<Annie>さん、 気にしないでください……
Entry.EnglishText: Please don't worry about it, Miss <Annie>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくは、キュリア先生みたいな 立派なお医者さんを 目指してるんです！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll become a splendid doctor just like Doctor Curia!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>さん、どっちが 先にお医者さんになるか、 競争しましょう！
Entry.EnglishText: Why don't we make a race on who'll become a doctor first, <Annie>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>さんっていう ライバルもできたし……
Entry.EnglishText: Now that Miss <Annie>'s my new rival...

Entry.JapaneseText: 前以上にがんばろうっていう 気持ちが強くなった気がします。
Entry.EnglishText: I feel like I can work harder than ever before!

Entry.JapaneseText: キュリア先生といると、 周りのガジュマの目が なぜか冷たいんです。
Entry.EnglishText: It feels like the Gajuma around me have been giving me cold stares whenever I'm with Doctor Curia.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今までそんな事、 ほとんどなかったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: That wasn't the case before though...

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、クレアさんに 会ったんです。
ガジュマとヒューマのケンカを 止めるのを手伝ってくれたんですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: She's the one who helped quell down the fighting between Gajumas and Humas.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>さん、顔色が あまり良くないですよ…… 無理しないでくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: Mr. <Veigue>? Your face looks really pale... Please don't overexert yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだかよくわかんないけど 不安な気持ちで いっぱいなんです……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know why, but I feel really really anxious.

Entry.JapaneseText: よくない事が起こる…… そんな予感がして……
Entry.EnglishText: It feels like something bad is about to happen...

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクも医者になる勉強を してるんです…… 大変だけどやりがいがあります。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm also studying to become a doctor... It's hard, but worthwhile!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000010>おつかれさまです、 キュリア先生。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000010>Thanks for coming to the rescue, Doctor Curia.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000011>何があったかは知らないけど、 ずいぶん衰弱してるわね。 体も冷たいし、唇の色も悪い。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000011>I don't know what happened, but she's incredibly weak. Her temperature is low and her lips are pale.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000012>でも命に別状はないわ。 しばらく温かくして 横になっていれば すぐに回復するわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000012>But she's not in critical condition. As long as she's kept warm and gets plenty of rest, I expect that she'll make a full recovery.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000017>俺たちは、ここで時間を とられるわけにはいかない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000017>We don't have the luxury of wasting time here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100001a>あなたたち、 どこに行くの？
<voice:1100001b>先を急ぐので、 これで失礼します。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100001B>We're in a hurry, so if you'll excuse us...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100001d>元気になったら、好きなように させてやってください。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100001D>When she recovers, please let her do as she wishes.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100001e>あなたたちの 連れじゃないの？
<voice:1100001f>雪の中に倒れていた娘を助けた。 ……それだけの関係です。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100001F>We helped her after finding her passed out in the snow. That's the extent of our connection.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000021>申し訳ありませんが、 後はあなたにお任せします。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000021>I'm truly sorry to inconvenience you, but she's in your hands now.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000d8>なるほど…… あなたが彼女の言ってた <Veigue>だったのね……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000D8>I see... So you're the <Veigue> she was talking about.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000da>答える前に、教えてくれない？ あなたたちは、何者なの？ 今、何が起こってるっていうの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000DA>Before I tell you, would you mind explaining yourselves to me? Who are you people, and just what on earth is going on?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000dc>あなたたち、ちょっと 普通じゃないわよ。
<voice:110000dd>こんなにも衰弱した子を連れて来て おいて、すぐに出ていっちゃうし、 あのクレアって子もただ事じゃない 様子だったし……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000DD>You drop a half-dead girl into my care and then make a quick exit. Plus, it seemed as though Claire was in a strange situation as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000de>ちゃんと説明してもらわないと 話もできないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000DE>Unless you can explain to me what's going on, I'm not telling you anything.
<voice:110000E0>...Then we have no choice but to talk.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000e1>……そう、あのクレアって子、 <Blue>王の盾<White>に……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000E1>So, Claire was kidnapped by the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000e2>それに、この子…… やっぱり、ドクター・バースの 娘さんだったのね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000E2>And this girl here... She's the daughter of Doctor Barrs, isn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000e3>バースを知っているんですか？
<voice:110000e4>研修医だった頃に、講義を受けたわ。 ドクターは、<Annie>の…… この子の話もよくされていたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000E4>I was a medical student of his. He spoke about <Annie> all the time.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000e5>あなたが、そのドクターを…… 本当なの……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000E5>About the Doctor... Is it true you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000e7>……何か事情があるのね？ その事は、無理には聞かないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000E7>I'm assuming there's more to the story? I won't pry any further...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000e8>……それより、クレアは!? どうしてあんたのところへ来たんだ？ 病気だったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000E8>Going back to Claire, what happened? Why did she come to you? Was she sick!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000e9>ケガをしたって、 兵隊さんに連れられて来たけど、 ほんのかすり傷だったわ。 消毒しておしまい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000E9>She was brought here by a soldier because she was hurt, but it was just a scratch. I applied some disinfectant and that was that.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000ea>……クレアは、あんたに 何か言ってなかったか？
<voice:110000eb>ええ、あなたに伝言を 頼まれたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000EB>Yes, she gave me a message to pass onto you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000ee>船には乗らない……？ 他には？
<voice:110000ef>兵隊さんの監視が厳しくて、 それだけ話すのがやっとだったわ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000EF>She had an armed escort who was watching her like a hawk, so that's about the only thing she was able to tell me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000f1>サレたちは他の街でも、 ヒューマの娘を集めようと しているのかもしれない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000F1>Saleh may be trying to gather up Huma girls from other towns as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000f2>そう考えれば、海ではなく 陸路を移動して、別の街に 向かっている事も説明できる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000F2>If so, then it would be safe to assume they are traveling by land instead of by sea, and are heading toward another city.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000f3>それをクレアさんは ボクたちに伝えてくれた。 ……つくづくクレアさんって 強い人なんだね……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000F3>So that's what her message meant. ...Claire's really got her wits about her, hasn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000f4><Blue>王の盾<White>は、女の子をさらって 何をするつもりなの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000F4>What are the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> hoping to achieve by abducting girls?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000f5>わからない。 だが、そんな事はどうだっていい。 オレは一刻も早く、 クレアを助けたいんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000F5>I don't know and I don't care. I just want to rescue Claire as soon as possible!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000f8>うん！ もう船も必要ないしネ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000F8>Yeah! And I guess we don't need to worry about a boat anymore.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000fb>あなたは…… このままでいいの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000FB>Are you okay with leaving like this?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000103><Annie>!? ミーシャはずっとキミを 看病してくれてたんだよ！ どうして？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000103><Annie>! Misha has been taking care of you this entire time! What's wrong!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000104>いやっ!! ガジュマに触られたくないの!! わたしに近寄らないで…… 来ないで……来ないでッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000104>No! I don't want some Gajuma touching me! Don't come near me... Stay away!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000105>来ないで……って…… そ、そんな……ぼく…… ぼく……！
<voice:1100010a>ねえ、<Annie>。 どうしてあんなコト言ったの？ ガジュマもヒューマも、 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>でしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100010A><Annie>, why would you say that to another <Yellow>Human<White> being? Aren't Huma and Gajuma all the same?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100010d>……<Eugene>に…… 父親を殺されたからか？ だから、すべてのガジュマが憎いか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100010D>Is it...because <Eugene> killed your dad? Do you hate all Gajuma because of that?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000111>わたしと同じ立場になれば 誰だって……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000111>Anyone who went through what I did would understand...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000112>……もし犯人がヒューマだったら どうしていた？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000112>...What would you think if the person who killed him was a Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000115>……そんなコトより、 ボク、ミーシャが気になる！ あの様子、普通じゃなかったヨ！ ねえ、行こうよ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000115>...Not to change the subject, but I'm worried about Misha. That reaction wasn't normal! We've gotta go after him!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100017b>ミーシャの具合は いかがですか？
<voice:1100017c>よく寝てるわ…… ゆっくり休めば大丈夫。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100017C>He's sleeping well. As long as he gets plenty of rest, he'll be okay.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100017f>ミーシャの心配も大事だけど、 <Eugene>は大丈夫なの!? さっき、バイラスの攻撃を まともに受けてたみたいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100017F>I'm glad Misha's okay, but what about you, <Eugene>? It looked like you took a direct hit from that Virus earlier...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000180>ああ、平気だ。 この程度の傷、すぐに治る。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000180>I'm fine. A minor injury like that will heal in no time.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000181>……それにしても、 恐ろしい世の中に なってきたわね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000181>...I must say, our world certainly is becoming a frightening place.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000183>何がきっかけで、 誰が暴走するのかわからない。 再び……<Blue>ラドラスの落日<White>が 起こる可能性だってあるのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000183>You never know when one's Force is about to go berserk, or why. Something like the <Blue>Dusk of Ladras<White> could potentially happen again.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000184>……この国の偉い人たちが一体、 何を考えてるのか、わからない。 でも、このまま放っておけば、取り返しの つかない事になるような気がするわ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000184>I have no idea what those in charge of this kingdom are thinking, but what I do know is that if things carry on the way they are, there will be no going back.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000187>気をつけて…… 私にできる事は多くはないけど、 力が必要な時はいつでもここに来て。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000187>Take care of yourselves. I can't offer much now, but if you ever need my help, please don't hesitate to stop by.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100018a>彼女の事は俺に責任があります。 責めないでやってください。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100018A>She is my responsibility. Please don't blame her.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100018b>責めるつもりはないわ。 でも、このままじゃあまりにも……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100018B>I have no intention to. But just leaving her be seems rather...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100018c>ええ……俺にできるものなら、 なんとかしたいのですが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100018C>Yes. I want to do something for her if possible, but I'm not sure what exactly...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00002a>……手袋の下、凍り始めてるわね。 フォルスのせいよね……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B00002A>...The skin underneath your glove has started freezing over. I take it this is because of your Force?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00002b>……原因は想像つくけど。 その事、みんなには相談したの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B00002B>...Though I can imagine why. Have you mentioned this to the others?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00002d>何をじゃないわよ。 自分の手が凍るなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B00002D><Veigue>, please! Your hands are freezing over...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00002e>放っておけば、 大変な事になるわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B00002E>If you keep ignoring it, it's bound to get worse.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00002f>……だったら……だったら クレアを元に戻す方法を 教えてくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B00002F>Then... Then tell me how I can get Claire back to normal.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000030>……陛下のフォルスで 元に戻す以外に、方法は ないんじゃないかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000030>...Aside from Her Majesty's own Force, I doubt there is any other way.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000031>それができれば、 とっくにやっている!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000031>As if I wasn't trying to get her to do that for me in the first place!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000032>今のオレには…… アガーテがどこにいるのかさえ わからないんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000032>But right now... I don't know where the hell Agarte might even be!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000034>昨日、港でもめごとがあって、 その時……クレアさん……が 止めてくれました。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000034>There was a fight down at the harbor yesterday, and the one who helped me put an end to it was... Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000035>まだ…… 街にいるかもしれません。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000035>So, she might still be in the city somewhere.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00007b><Veigue>…… やっぱり、今のままの私じゃ…… ダメなの……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B00007B><Veigue>... I'm... no good like this, am I?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00007d>苦しめて、ごめんね…… 今まで、ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B00007D>I'm sorry for making you suffer... And, thank you for everything...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000ab>ここは……ミナール？ どうして……
<speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
